metadata.name: üêØ Year of The Water Tiger Dress
metadata.description:
Inspired by the Year of the Water Tiger (2022).

As someone who grew up celebrating Chinese New Year, I feel compelled to design a piece inspired by it.

The color palette is inspired by Chinese culture; red for good fortune and gold for wealth.

The composition is a nod to Hu Zaobin and how he pairs tigers with nature in his paintings.

The waterfall symbolizes the element of 2022. Because tigers symbolize strength and water symbolizes flow and open-mindedness, the year of the water tiger will bring about growth, challenges, endurance, and creation.

The year of the water tiger occurs once every 60 years.

---

The owner of this piece will be able to get digitally dressed in it 2x a year, for life.
